venue.name: The Regattabar at the Charles Hotel

item.description:
A very special night featuring two bands that sound like no one else!
What a better way to celebrate Martin Luther King week-end with two very unique bands like Atlas Soul and Timbila!
World music that Rocks would be a way to describe the evening..
$15 or $22 for both bands
This event is featured at the Boston World Music Meet-up group and the Boston Culture Club.
More info:
http://www.atlas-soul.com
Facebook event page
https://www.facebook.com/events/228347917297759/
item.name: Atlas Soul and Timbila at the Regattabar
